message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DL. 

This paper presents a statistical machine translation system for Sanskrit-Hindi language pair. Therefore, it is most likely to belong to the category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the system has been developed using Moses, which is a popular tool for machine translation and natural language processing, indicating a possible fit with Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of a parallel corpus and BLEU score also suggests a possible fit with Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. Finally, the use of a statistical approach and the mention of a monolingual corpus may indicate a possible fit with Deep Learning (cs.DL) sub-category.
